sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-my-hello-component', templateUrl: './my-hello-component.component.html', styleUrls: ['./my-hello-component.component.css'] }) export class MyHelloComponentComponent { imageURL = "https://picsum.photos/200"; imageALT = "An image from picsum photos"; imageTooltip = this.imageALT }
